item.title: Concerts and festivals I've been to
item.description: EDM ❤️ 2021-07-18 Tchami (New York) 2021-08-08 Oliver Heldens (Boston) 2021-09-04 EZOO Day 2 (New York) Zomboy Steve Aoki Tiësto Rezz Kaskade 2021-10-21 Porter Robinson (New York) Jai Wolf 2022-03-19 Slander (Boston) 2022-04-14 Said the Sky (New Haven) Kaivon 2022-05-02 Sofi Tukker (New Haven) 2022-05-14 Adventure Club (Chicago) Bear Grillz 2022-09-02 EZOO Day 1 (New York) Trivecta Jason Ross Diplo Slander Porter Robinson 2022-09-04 EZOO Day 3 (New York) Gordo Subtronics Seven Lions Martin Garrix 2022-09-28 Flume (New York) 2022-12-03 Ray Volpe and Jason Ross (Boston)

item.title: Tools I use
item.description: A running list of all of the tools and services I regularly use. Temporary notes, ideas, and checklists: Google Keep Personal to do list: TickTick Class notes: OneNote Personal notes: Notion Data storage and personal “apps”: Airtable No-code app development: Glide Personal planning/time management: Reclaim Scheduling link: Calendly + Cal.

item.title: Light Fellowship blog
item.description: I made this photography blog summer 2019, when I studied abroad in Beijing as a Richard U. Light fellow. It was my first time in nearly 10 years that I was back in China, and I wanted to explore how the country and its culture had changed through photography.

item.title: alexchendesigns
item.description: Created this Instagram account to showcase some of my favorite photos. I’ve tried making photography portfolio websites in the past, but I find it takes too much effort to manage.
